channel.title: Request: An almost empty server
channel.description:
I'd like a server which is almost empty, which I can edit, like ''Your-Server'', and is for beginners. The reason I do not like ''Your-Server'' is that people say that it contains a RAT (Remote admin tool)
It must be able to run on a [b]very slow[/b] computer. It does not have to connect to the internet, it's just for development and trying stuff.
Does anybody know a source and client like this?
PC specs are: 333mhz, 128mb ram. :o :P

item.title: Request: An almost empty server
item.description:
@1500 wrote:

Reamm28:

I dont understand what you mean by “easy”. Coding a 317 is easy

Like EvolutionX where you can just edit the .cfg’s. But I need a lighter-source than that. Cause it’s lagging as hell when I run it, even in low-mem.

Read full topic

item.title: Request: An almost empty server
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

I dont understand what you mean by “easy”. Coding a 317 is easy

item.title: Request: An almost empty server
item.description:
@1500 wrote:

[quote=“Reamm28, post:2, topic:349423”]If you really said this
“PC specs are: 333mhz, 128mb ram”
Then your server could hold atleast 1-2 people without lagg

Here you go http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,427654.0.html
Click that to download wichever almost-empty server base that you want[/quote]

I don’t really understand those sources. Do you have some more easy-sources?

Read full topic
